content.description:
on the up-hill most face, sit start matched on the obvious low jug at the base of the short but steep section. Off the start I also heel-hooked by my hands on the same jug. 

  Once off the start, grab the thin but good right hand side-pull  crimp and pull up to the overhead in-cut crimp. Trend right through good holds to hit the top lip for a juggy top-out. 

  Enjoy one of the best views in the park from a climbers-only lookout on top of the Kingdom Boulder.

This is an aesthetic Boulder tucked away in the forest near the Buzzard Rock Overlook  (first overlook). There  is one main problem here at the moment with likely several more to come. Once at the top, climbers can enjoy one of the best views in the park
